footer.company: Sunrise New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. dedicated to delivering all-encompassing one-stop solar solutions for both residential and commercial & industrial sectors across Nigeria.

benefits.subtitle: Why Choose Us
benefits.title: The Sunrise Advantage
benefits.description: Experience the benefits of choosing Sunrise for your solar energy needs.

products.subtitle: Our Product Range
products.title: One-Stop Solar Solution
products.description: Our comprehensive range of solar energy products designed to provide efficient, reliable, and sustainable power solutions for homes and businesses.

projects.subtitle: Recent Work
projects.title: Featured Projects

about.subtitle: About Sunrise
about.title: Experience Quality Solar Solutions
about.description1: Sunrise New Energy Technology Co., Ltd., incorporated in Kano State, Nigeria, is dedicated to delivering all-encompassing one-stop solar solutions for both residential and commercial & industrial sectors across Nigeria.
about.description2: Its parent company, Shandong Longguang Tianxu Solar Energy Co., Ltd. is a global leader in advanced solar solutions. With advanced technologies and rich experience, we provide reliable and efficient solar energy solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Harness the Power of the Sun?
cta.description: Take the first step towards energy independence and sustainability. Contact us today for a free consultation.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: Reduce your carbon footprint with clean, renewable solar energy that helps protect the environment.

savings.title: Cost Savings
savings.description: Significant reduction in electricity bills, with systems that typically pay for themselves in a few years.

independence.title: Energy Independence
independence.description: Gain control over your energy needs with reduced dependence on the traditional power grid.

power.title: Reliable Power
power.description: Enjoy uninterrupted power supply even during grid outages with our energy storage solutions.

maintenance.title: Low Maintenance
maintenance.description: Solar systems require minimal maintenance, with most components designed to last 25+ years.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Access to a team of solar experts for consultation, design, installation, and ongoing support.

panel.title: Solar Panel
panel.description: High-efficiency photovoltaic panels that convert sunlight into electricity for your home or business.

battery.title: Energy Storage Battery
battery.description: Advanced battery systems that store excess solar energy for use when the sun isn't shining.

inverter.title: Inverter
inverter.description: Converts DC electricity generated by solar panels into AC electricity for your appliances.

pump.title: PV Water Pump
pump.description: Solar-powered water pumping solutions for agricultural irrigation and water supply.

cabinet.title: PV-ESS Integrated Cabinet
cabinet.description: All-in-one solutions that combine solar power generation with energy storage capabilities.

rack.title: Cable Rack
rack.description: Professional cable management systems for clean and safe solar installations.

retail.title: Retail Store, Kano State
retail.description: 16 kWp PV + 8kW/15kWh battery system with average daily yield of 90 kWh.

hotel.title: Hotel, Tashkent, Uzbekistan
hotel.description: 20 kW Grid-tied PV Project + 5 kW/10 kWh Energy Storage System.

sunbelt.title: Sunbelt Group, Kano State
sunbelt.description: 221 kW Grid-tied PV Project with 360,000 kWh annual yield and ROI less than 2 years.
